DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial 3-month psychoeducational program intervention , follow 3 month observational period . The purpose study examine whether psychoeducational program focus equip caregiver problem-solving skill would improve caregiver 's problem-solving ability , psychological response caregiving resource , would minimize use health social service among stroke survivor .
